    G

    Game - Class in engine
    The Game class represents the main engine of the Jackaroo game.
    Game(String) - Constructor for class engine.Game
    Constructs a new Game instance, initializing the board, players, and game state.
    GameException - Exception Class in exception
    An abstract class that represents a game-specific exception.
    GameException() - Constructor for exception class exception.GameException
    Default constructor that initializes the GameException without any error message.
    GameException(String) - Constructor for exception class exception.GameException
    Constructor that initializes the GameException with a custom error message.
    GameManager - Interface in engine
    The GameManager interface provides methods for interacting with the main game logic.
    getCells() - Method in class engine.board.SafeZone
    Retrieves a copy of the list of safe cells in this SafeZone.
    getCellType() - Method in class engine.board.Cell
    Retrieves the type of this cell.
    getColour() - Method in class engine.board.SafeZone
    Retrieves the colour associated with this SafeZone.
    getColour() - Method in class model.player.Marble
    Retrieves the colour of the marble.
    getColour() - Method in class model.player.Player
    Retrieves the player's associated colour.
    getCurrentPlayer() - Method in class engine.Game
    Retrieves the player whose turn is currently active.
    getCurrentPlayer() - Method in interface engine.GameManager
    Retrieves the player whose turn is currently active.
    getCurrentPlayerIndex() - Method in class engine.Game
    Retrieves the index of the current player.
    getCurrentPlayerIndex() - Method in interface engine.GameManager
    Retrieves the index of the current player.
    getDescription() - Method in class model.card.Card
    Retrieves the description of the card.
    getHand() - Method in class model.player.Player
    Retrieves the player's current hand of cards.
    getMarble() - Method in class engine.board.Cell
    Retrieves the marble in this cell.
    getMarbles() - Method in class model.player.Player
    Retrieves the marbles owned by the player.
    getName() - Method in class model.card.Card
    Retrieves the name of the card.
    getName() - Method in class model.player.Player
    Retrieves the player's name.
    getRank() - Method in class model.card.standard.Standard
    Retrieves the rank of the card.
    getSafeZones() - Method in class engine.board.Board
    Retrieves the safe zones on the board.
    getSelectedCard() - Method in class model.player.Player
    Retrieves the currently selected card for play.
    getSplitDistance() - Method in class engine.board.Board
    Retrieves the split distance used for game mechanics.
    getSplitDistance() - Method in interface engine.board.BoardManager
    Calculates the distance for a split move on the board.
    getSuit() - Method in class model.card.standard.Standard
    Retrieves the suit of the card.
    getTrack() - Method in class engine.board.Board
    Retrieves the track of the board.
    getTurn() - Method in class engine.Game
    Retrieves the current turn number.
    getTurn() - Method in interface engine.GameManager
    Retrieves the current turn count in the game.
    GREEN - Enum constant in enum class model.Colour
    Represents the green colour for marbles and player zones.
